name: Damage: Sadistic Butchering of Humanity
description: Idea of Damage is simple: kill as many people as possible! Damage is a black humor 2D action adventure game where you roam freely in a wide urban setting killing thousands of enemies. New Arcade-mode lets you quickly get into action, try different weapons and drugs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel i3-4005U @ 1.7 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9400M DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 - 4590 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD radeon rx 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space
